para.text: A title insurer may satisfy its obligation to file premium rates, rating manuals, and forms as required by this chapter if:
It becomes a member of, or a subscriber to, a rate service organization, organized and licensed under the provisions of acts relating to insurance which are codified in this title;
The rate service organization makes the filings; and
It authorizes the Commissioner in writing to accept the filings on the title insurer’s behalf.
Require any title insurer to become a member of, or a subscriber to, any rate service organization; and
Prohibit the filing of deviations from rate service organization filings by any member or subscriber.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2160 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
